files.name: provider.tf
variables.tf
main.tf
outputs.tf
terraform.tfvars
files.content:
aws_region   = "us-east-1"
project_name = "chat-app"
environment  = "dev"

# Provide an ACM cert ARN to enable HTTPS on the ALB.
# acm_certificate_arn = "arn:aws:acm:us-east-1:123456789012:certificate/xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx"

# Optionally override the image to deploy.
# ecr_image = "123456789012.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/chat-app-dev:latest"

desired_count = 2

# WebSocket-friendly idle timeout
alb_idle_timeout_seconds = 300

# Optional features
enable_waf              = false
enable_s3_public_assets = false
